name: shub1i

stmt.origin: sstri(c0, co(c0, chj, c1), co(c0, cph, c1))

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wss(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wss(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, cph, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wss(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

body.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, cph, c1), co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, co(c0, chj, c1))
-| wcel(c0, csh)
-| wcel(c1, csh)

comment: Hilbert lattice join is an upper bound of two subspaces. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
